title: The Fight for Immortality
description: This book combines Collision Earth and Conquest Earth into a single volume Author's Note: This edition of FFI was revised on October/1/14. Thank you to all my reviewers for highlighting areas that needed change. Your voice was heard.All his life Jack Cousins felt destined to achieve extraordinary things - but has no idea of how or why.When a small company in Las Vegas introduces otherworldly technology and education to the planet, he feels a deep turmoil. Both he and Earth will be impacted by powerful and deceptive forces which alter Earth rapidly and unexpectedly.Jack's girlfriend shockingly signs a contract to train in the new high technology. Fearing she is in mortal danger, he is compelled to take extreme measures.In the face of insurmountable odds, Jack must accept the challenge and fight for immortality - or die trying.(The concept of immortality in this story is based on an Ancient Alien Culture)
author: Peter Arthur
